LanguageData.RH.RangerProvisionsDesc:
Provisions will give your caravan inventory the following every 12 hours:

- ×5 Ranger rations
- ×1 Medicine
LanguageData.RH.RangerProvisionsDescRangerIssue:
Ranger Issue will give your caravan inventory the following every 30 days:

- ×1 Colt Walker
- ×1 Duster (Ranger) 
- x50 Industrial Ammo
